item.title: Her begynder vi
item.description: Introduction Installerer Hugo p√• din local computer hugo new site hugo_site cd hugo_site cd themes git clone https://github.com/calintat/minimal.git cd minimal cp hugo_site/themes/minimal/exampleSite/* /hugo_site/ hugo cd public git init git remote add origin https://github.com/xxx/xxx.github.io.git git pull origin master git add . git commit -m "made some changes." git push origin master
